#summary Pwnage for the iPhone 2G and 3G on 2.2 (BETA - wait for devteam release if you want things to be totally stable!)
#labels Featured

=Instructions=

Download the latest PwnageTool from the iPhone Dev Team (blog.iphone-dev.org). 
Click on the PwnageTool Icon, click "Show Package Contents". Move the CydiaInstaller (from the 3G Bundle) into Contents/Resources/CustomPackages and the iPhone1,1_2.2_5G77.bundle / iPhone1,2_2.2_5G77.bundle into Contents/Resources/FirmwareBundles.

Build your own IPSW, restore in iTunes. :)
